name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance application development, particularly in API integration and chatbot development. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Python**, with hands-on expertise in integrating **AI APIs** such as **OpenAI**, **Gemini**, and **Anthropic** to enhance conversational interfaces and provide cutting-edge solutions. Experienced in building efficient **ETL pipelines** and leveraging prompt engineering and document parsing techniques to optimize data flow and user interactions. 
Additionally, well-versed in implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines in cloud environments on **AWS** and **Azure**. Holds a strong background in compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Recognized for delivering projects that align with business goals while managing complex system architectures.
